name: canvas-compositor
description: a light and performant canvas compositing engine

scripts.build: npm run clean && concurrently 'npm run build-lib' 'npm run build-dist'
scripts.build-dist: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js -s CanvasCompositor -t [ babelify tinyify ] | uglifyjs > dist/canvas-compositor.min.js
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js -s CanvasCompositor -d -t [ babelify tinyify ] > dist/canvas-compositor.min.js

author: Christopher J Gore
